title: Question: Vertical Position
body:
AFAIK, **image vertical position** using to position the showing content of image when image is too high right?

> example: if I have very high image with sky, building, park. I want to show the park then set the position to 100

How about if I have long image? (Horizontal, Banner image) Can I set this also because among of my images mostly is long images not the tall one.
author: l2eused

comments.body:
> @l2eused 
> so you are looking for a `banner-x` option right?
> 
> Please consider joining our Discord :)

if it not exist yet then yes, would be great if there are since we alrealy have the -y one

title: Pexels Banner Not in the community plug in area
body: Having a hard time finding the plug-in....
author: blackghostosint
